content:
- Komplet tipkovnica in miška Microsoft Basic Black Value Pack = 8 € (novo - nerabljeno)
  http://www.microsoft.com/hardware/systembuilders/ProductDetails.aspx?pid=009

- Komplet tipkovnica in miška Microsoft MultiMedia Optical Value Pack = 13 € (novo - nerabljeno)
  http://www.microsoft.com/hardware/systembuilders/ProductDetails.aspx?pid=008

- Brezžična optična miška Microsoft Wireless Optical Mouse 2.0A = 8 € (novo - nerabljeno)
  http://www.microsoft.com/hardware/systembuilders/ProductDetails.aspx?pid=012

- Brezžična laserska miška Microsoft Wireless Laser Mouse 5000 = 15 € (novo - originalno zapakirano)
  http://www.microsoft.com/hardware/mouseandkeyboard/productdetails.aspx?pid=068

- Slovenska tipkovnica za prenosnik HP Compaq 6730b/6735b (P/N: 487136-BA1) = 25 € (novo - nerabljeno)
  http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizs...ectID=c01602480

- Buffalo Nfiniti Wireless-N Desktop PCI Adapter WLI-PCI-G300N = 13 € (novo - originalno zapakirano) 
  http://www.buffalo-technology....ti-pci-adapter/

- Spletna kamera Philips ToUcam FUN II PCVC830K = 5 € (skoraj nič rabljena - v originalni embalaži) 
  http://www.p4c.philips.com/cgi-bin/dcbint/cpindex.pl?slg=en&scy=gb&ctn=PCVC830K/00

- IR daljinček za HP Pavilion/Compaq Presario prenosnike = 5 € (skoraj nič rabljen) 
  Kompatibilni modeli: HP Pavilion dv1000t, dv2000, dv5000, dv6000, dv8000, dv9000 in Compaq Presario V2000, V3000, V5000, V6000
  http://www.amazon.com/Mobile-Remote-Control-Express-Card/dp/B000NB87AG

- Slušalke z mikrofonom Logitech Premium Stereo Headset = 5 € (skoraj nič rabljene - brez embalaže)
  http://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Premium-Headset-Noise-Canceling-Microphone/dp/B00009APBV

- Foto tiskalnik HP Photosmart A516 = 40 € (novo - originalno zapakirano)
  http://www.amazon.com/Photosmart-A516-Compact-Printer-Q7021A/dp/B000GAY5IC


Večinoma so vse zadeve v originalni embalaži, nove in nerabljene ali pa so rabljene zelo malo (glej opis).
Ogled in prevzem je možen v Domžalah ali Trzinu. Možno je tudi pošiljanje po pošti na stroške kupca.

Kontakt:  dushan75@gmail.com
author: Dushan
